FINANCE the activity of giving advice on which shares to buy or sell: The Financial Services Authority announced the formation of an e-commerce team to monitor tipping on the internet. Their shares plunged further following negative comments on a share tipping website.
COMMERCE the act of giving an amount of money to someone who has provided a service, especially in a hotel or restaurant: In the States tipping is common.
